publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1303.1 Phil Gallie: Drugs Courts-As an amendment to motion (S1M-1303) in the name of Roseanna Cunningham, leave out from "with a view" to end and insert "based on the aims laid out in the 1999 Scottish Conservative and Unionist Election Manifesto." Supported by: Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*
